sqlmap.sql: INSERT INTO STATION_DATA(STATION_CODE, STATION_NM, LINE_NUM, FRCODE) VALUES(?,?,?,?)
SELECT STATION_CODE STATION_CODE, STATION_NM STATION_NM, LINE_NUM LINE_NUM, FRCODE FRCODE FROM STATION_DATA WHERE STATION_NM = ? AND LINE_NUM = ?
SELECT FRCODE FROM STATION_DATA WHERE STATION_NM = ? AND LINE_NUM = ?
SELECT USER_ID user_id FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT seq SEQ, user_id USER_ID, user_content USER_CONTENT, type TYPE, rg_dt RG_DT FROM USER_DATA WHERE USER_ID = ?
